question: お盆
sourceMnemonic: <ja>盆</ja> refers to either the <kanji>lantern festival</kanji> or a <kanji>tray</kanji>. The <ja>お</ja> just makes it higher status. The meanings stay the same, though. So, depending on the context, this means <vocabulary>Lantern Festival</vocabulary>, aka <vocabulary>obon</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>obon festival</vocabulary>, or a <vocabulary>tray</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
